amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the application of section 3 if any part of a pipeline facility that is a subject of the application is to be located on lands required under Federal, State, or local law to be managed for purposes of natural resource conservation or recreation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 249 (Roll no. 399).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 249 (Roll no. 399).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
